table_of_contents.title: pt. 1.

The descent of the Colorado: Major Powell (Wallace Stegner) --

Storm off Cape Horn (Joshua Slocum) --
Back from the border of death (Charles A. Lindbergh) --
The enemy sleep  (Charles A. Lindbergh) --
Woman alone (Laurens van der Post) --

Dunkirk (Arthur D. Divine) --
Bataan (Sidney Stewart) --

In the bowels of the earth: the speleologists (John Stewart Collis) -- -- pt. 2.

The trials of Job (the Old Testament) --

The trial and crucifixion of Jesus ((the New Testament) --

Alone (Rear-Admiral Richard E. Byrd) --

The four chaplains (Rev. Francis B. Thornton) --

The diary of a young girl (Anne Frank) --
The woman who could not die (Iulia de Beausobre) --
A now to live again (Betsey Barton) --
Death be not proud (John Gunther) --

title: Triumph over odds
full_title: Triumph over odds an anthology of man's unconquerable spirit, edited with a foreword and introductory notes
subtitle: an anthology of man's unconquerable spirit, edited with a foreword and introductory notes
